Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsFather up at night woke all up to look at object then after watching it for several minutes we followed it until it took off in an arc at a very high rate of speed we were very scared. The object hovered for a while and my father took us for a ride to follow it we followed it for around 5-10 minutes. The object acsended super fast from around 20 miles an hr to so fast u could not see it.
Summary: fort know ky at night family watched from window then followed
